CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 30, 1957, pg. A14 reads: "Military Wedding - S/Sgt. and Mrs. William J. Burrell walk through an honor guard arch following their Saturday wedding at the Greater Pittsburgh Air Base Chapel. The bride is the former Bernice Johnson of Beltzhoover.  The groom is a Philadelphian. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Bride Bernice Johnson Burrell wearing dress with short puffed sleeves and floral jacquard scalloped stripes on skirt, and groom Staff Sergeant William J. Burrell wearing military uniform, walking between six men wearing military uniforms and holding rifles posed in honor guard stance, with cinder block chapel in background, Greater Pittsburgh Air Base
